titleStmt.title: The school of politicks, or, The humours of a coffee-house a poem.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Edward, 1667-1731.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition corrected and much enlarged by the author.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by R. Baldwin,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
